title: A Dark Tide
description: An army of shadows, bringing darkness; a warrior's curse, bringing life and death; the dragons rage upon the wind, and the fire of truth touches the shadow. In this sixth novel in the 'Book of One' Epic Fantasy series, the forces of the dark god wage war across the land. The warrior meets the one who seeks destruction and the truth of fire is denied, as the power of the shadow grows.
author: Jordan  Baker
